comment: No homework just tests so very little work. Boring lectures.

Easiest class I've had in a long time. No exams or final. 4 easy writing assignments of 300 words. Weekly open book/note quizzes without lockdown. Slideshows come from the book, and quiz questions come straight from the book. Weekly discussion posts and responses. That's it.

Took her for PAD 6300 - I liked her! She did attempt to change things to make it easier for us during the semester- it just didnt go well because alot of students were confused so not that great of communication. However, loved the course, she was very active with feedback on discussion for it to be a online course which i loved!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: Best online teacher you can get, she actually takes her job seriously despite being online. She puts in a lot of time: grading nearly immediately and responding to every students post. I feel bad that when she goes above and beyond to do a voice call, not many students show up. Yet, she's truly a kind and thoughtful teacher who loves her job.

Excellent, Professor. I'm enrolling in another course with her next semester. Her sense of humor is delightful, and her feedback is exceptionally valuable. Despite being in an online class, she provides insightful responses on the discussion boards.

Class is formatted a bit odd, but it gets easy to follow quickly. Discussions have to ACTUALLY be discussions, responses are required or she docks you heavily. Material is really intriguing, but the required lectures can be a bit of a snooze fest. Overall, easygoing and seems to care about her students. Little reading, have to get creative at times

Homeland Security was a tough but great course. It is so big and complicted but you really get to see what the Dept. is all about. Assignments were open book and you get a week. The book is detailed. Dr. N gives good powerpoints and lots of discussion. She responded to nearly every one of my posts. no other professor here has done that. Good job!

Attendance isn't mandatory, but you get extra credit for showing up. One of the best professors I have had, period. Focuses more on ensuring you're learning the material and can apply it, lots of working with other students in class. You'll learn a lot!
Dr. N is one of the best.

Dr. N. really does care if you are learning the material, and if you do the reading and go through her material you will do well. The discussion board posts are helpful in allowing you to interact and assimilate the information that you are learning. You will use a lot of critical thinking, and Dr. N. will comment on all the posts, which I loved.

She's a great professor to take for senior seminar. No long papers, no test. Her class is about expanding your critical thinking through discussion post and three very short policy briefs. She is quick to respond to emails and is very helpful. You have to do the work, but it is interesting and really does help your critical thinking ability grow.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: I saw another rating for this class that was bad but that was not my experience. Dr. Neuby was very organized, gave good feedback on assignments, and always responded to email  within a day so who knows what the other person was so mad about.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: Her assignments instructions are very unclear, she doesn't respect her students. She expects you to respond to everyones discussion board online. She doesn't respond back to emails on time.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: Horrible teacher. Makes you feel like you don't belong in the class. Grades hard, & very very disorganized.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: One of the WORST teacher i have ever had. She is very rude especially when you email her about assignments instruction. Instead of answering your email with answers, she asks back a question. Her assignments instructions are very unclear and she is all over the place. Very unorganized when it comes to discussion boards.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Most amazing teacher ever!!! Take her. Easy A if you do everything she ask for, and make sure you read the material and attend class.

Absolutely LOVE HER! you gotta bring your "A" game to her class for in class case work and homework, midterm and Final... Honestly she lets you use open book but thats so you can apply case law, she is awesome, helps you understand, totally approachable and HUMAN. Very fair, not an easy class but I'm glad because what I learned will stick with me!
LOVE. HER. When I grow up; I want to be just like NuNu! She keeps it 100%. Wish there were more professors like NuNu at KSUu!!!
Outstanding professor. Helpful. Wants students to think and appreciate material. Great feedback

Fantastic educator. Extremely fair and gives appropriate and honest feedback.Not easy, but if you pay attention, you will be fine in her class. She makes you think, so if you're allergic to critical thinking, move along. She's there for your benefit.

Neuby was by far the best professor I have had at KSU.  Very smart and funny. She makes learning fun and easy. She's very clear in her lectures, and the in-class work directly relates to our assignments/exams.  Great material - life lessons for anyone.  Loved loved this class. She always brought treats too! Love her.

The class wasn't a cake walk but I learned a lot!  My grades kept improving until I literally got a 100% on one of the later assignments... I learned a lot more than my 88% would lead one to think and I've done a lot of studying on my own since the class.
If you come to class and pay attention you are good for at least a C. I like her, the way she explains things is clear and unbiased. She's also entertaining.
very kind
smart, kind, professional
Lovin'u forever
I love Dr. Neuby, who is so kind and nice to our foreign students even if our English are not so good.
She is kind to students and always available for queations
Keeps your interest but makes you think. Can't blow off class. Don't mess with this one, she will see right through. But genuinely cares about students and is mostly funny
She is a great teacher, She follows her syllabus. A great teacher to take as long as you pay attention. She's an honest teacher.

WONDERFUL teacher.Best Ive ever had. She really wants you to learn. basically the class is a series of discussions about events going on in the world. Participation is required, but - its really fun to participate, like its a classroom wide discussion. NOT an easy A. I made it, but you'll need to work for it. STUDY THE BOOK. HIGHLY RECOMENDED.
Very good cless, easy, but you learn a lot too....participation is required though.

Great professor.  all you have to do is participate in two discussions a week.  Just give an educated opinion.  you can use the book on the exams and you have several days to take it.  i'm not even a POLS major and this was a breeze.

Fantastic teacher & wonderful woman!  Brings the material to life!  You earn your grade but you learn.  She loves her job and is very helpful.  Class is reading and applying.  If that is a problem, don’t take her.  She doesn't want you to memorize material, rather learn it and take it with you.  2 tests were open book and note.  Fun class! Take her

Dr. Neuby is fabulous!  This was an upper level online course and was not easy, but she kept everything interesting and lively.  Holds several study sessions before each test for anyone interested.  Online discussions were VERY active.  Keeps herself available via email/phone as often as possible.  Highly recommend her to anyone.
Great teacher. You will work hard but learn a lot. She is very funny and keeps class interesting.

No easy A but you will learn.  Wrote alot of essay papers but she is very fair.  Final open book but hard. I made it thru & hope I don't have to go through it again but if I had to I know it won't be too bad & she would have enlighted me on various subjects again. Loves to help students understand.
Governmental Budgeting...She is fun and interesting.  This class is not.  The guidelines and expectations are not clear.  Expect to use your head and be creative.
Only two exams, the midterm is a scenario and you have to write an paper using the information you have learned in class.  She also gives out a quiz after every chapter.  Attendance is very important

I had this teacher when she first came to KSU in the Summer of 2001. I really enjoyed her. Like the previous person stated, she is not that easy, but she MAKES you learn the material by using real life scenerios.  Comparative Politics was a greaqt course
It's not an easy A but you'll learn a lot. The lectures are interesting. Dr.Neuby is just great.
